# Tile Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Default

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Default | `app-tile bg-default` |
| Primary | `app-tile bg-primary` |
| Secondary | `app-tile bg-secondary` |
| Tertiary | `app-tile bg-tertiary` |
| Success | `app-tile bg-success` |
| Info | `app-tile bg-info` |
| Warning | `app-tile bg-warning` |
| Danger | `app-tile bg-danger` |

---

## Appearance: Filled

**Variants:**

| Variant Name | Class |
|--------------|-------|
| Default | `app-tile bg-default-filled` |
| Primary | `app-tile bg-primary-filled` |
| Secondary | `app-tile bg-secondary-filled` |
| Tertiary | `app-tile bg-tertiary-filled` |
| Success | `app-tile bg-success-filled` |
| Info | `app-tile bg-info-filled` |
| Warning | `app-tile bg-warning-filled` |
| Danger | `app-tile bg-danger-filled` |
